Progress will discontinue Telerik Platform on May 10th, 2018. Learn more

edit-configuration

Usage Synopsis
General $ appbuilder edit-configuration <ConfigurationFile>

Opens a configuration file for editing.

Attributes

  • <ConfigurationFile> is the configuration file that you want to open. The following values are valid for this attribute.
    • android-manifest - Opens AndroidManifest.xml for editing and creates it, if needed.
    • android-config - Opens config.xml for Android for editing and creates it, if needed.
    • ios-info - Opens Info.plist for editing and creates it, if needed.
    • ios-config - Opens config.xml for iOS for editing and creates it, if needed.
    • wp8-manifest - Opens WMAppManifest.xml for editing and creates it, if needed.
    • wp8-config - Opens config.xml for Windows Phone 8 for editing and creates it, if needed.

Related Commands

Command Description
mobileframework Lists all supported versions of the current development framework.
mobileframework set Sets the selected development framework version for the project.
prop Lets you manage the properties for your project.
prop print Prints information about the configuration of the project or the selected property.
prop add Enables more options for the selected project property, if the property accepts multiple values.
prop remove Disables options for the selected project property, if the property accepts multiple values.
prop set Sets the selected project property and overwrites its current value.
resource Lists information about the image resources for all mobile platforms.
resource create Creates image resources for all mobile platforms from a single high-resolution image.
webview Lists the available web views for iOS and Android.
webview set Sets the selected web view for the current project.
